mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (username, name, password, gmt_create) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{password}, #{gmtCreate})
mapper.select: select a.name, b.CONTRACT_ID id, b.DIVISION_ID d_id, b.FLOW_NO flow from sys_user a left join t_business_delivery_application b on a.user_id = b.CREATE_USER_ID WHERE a.user_id = 138
